DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study evaluate effect daily supplement probiotic ( Lactobacillus gasseri KS-13 , Bifidobacterium bifidum G9-1 , Bifidobacterium longum MM-2 ) stress-associated gastrointestinal function university student time semester exam .
DOC.brief_title: Probiotics Stress-associated Gastrointestinal Function University Students
DOC.detailed_description: In randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled study , undergraduate student plan take fall final exam receive daily probiotic combination , individual probiotic , placebo 6 week . Questionnaires assess gastrointestinal symptom , immune health , stress stress management , quality life , diet , adverse event , compliance . In subset subject , stool sample collect baseline week 5 intervention ( week final exam ) characterize microbial community .
DOC.criteria: At least 18 year age Healthy fulltime undergraduate student University Florida Willing able consume daily supplement ( probiotic placebo ) duration 6week study Willing able complete daily questionnaire online regard general health wellbeing , include stress level gastrointestinal symptom ( Note : recruit participant Internet access duration protocol , understand , enrol , situation may change . If case , paper copy online form provide ) Willing discontinue immuneenhancing dietary supplement ( e.g. , prebiotics fiber supplement , probiotic , Echinacea , fish oil , vitamin E [ > 400 % RDA > 60 mg/day ] ) Had cold/flu within past year Currently smoke Women lactate , know pregnant , attempt get pregnant Currently take systemic corticosteroid Currently treat physiciandiagnosed disease Have receive chemotherapy immune suppress therapy within last year
